verses.roman:
vipra kahe,--tumi sākṣāt śrī-raghunandana
sannyāsīra veṣe more dilā daraśana

synonyms: vipra kahe—the brāhmaṇa said; tumi—You; sākṣāt—directly; śrī-raghunandana—Lord Śrī Rāmacandra; sannyāsīra veṣe—in the dress of a mendicant; more—unto me; dilā—You gave; daraśana—audience.
translation: After receiving the manuscript, the brāhmaṇa, being very much pleased, said, "Sir, You are Lord Rāmacandra Himself and have come in the dress of a sannyāsī to give me audience.
